Description: Body sherd of Rhodian pottery Vroulia cup, probably with everted rim; interior glazed black; part of incised lotus flower and palmette with added red on petals; below, two incised bands; exterior glazed black; above, part of incised decoration with some added red on far right; below, two incised bands; below, top of incised central rosette with red on one petal and incised scalloped line framing top.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GN.23) (phase 3)
Schlotzhauer 2012 / Untersuchungen zur archaischen griechischen Keramik aus Naukratis (p. 163)
